objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1A1A1A;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#333333;stop-opacity:1' /></linearGradient><radialGradient id='glowEffect' cx='30%' cy='30%' r='60%' fx='30%' fy='30%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FF6B00;stop-opacity:0.7' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#1A1A1A;stop-opacity:0' /></radialGradient><filter id='blur' x='-50%' y='-50%' width='200%' height='200%'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceGraphic' stdDeviation='20' /></filter></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGrad)'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='2' height='1080' fill='#444444'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='250' fill='url(#glowEffect)' filter='url(#blur)'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='200' fill='url(#glowEffect)' filter='url(#blur)'/><g opacity='0.3'><path d='M50,100 L100,150 L50,200 L0,150 Z' fill='#FF6B00' transform='rotate(15, 50, 150)'/><path d='M980,100 L1030,150 L980,200 L930,150 Z' fill='#FF6B00' transform='rotate(45, 980, 150)'/><path d='M100,880 L150,930 L100,980 L50,930 Z' fill='#FF6B00' transform='rotate(30, 100, 930)'/><path d='M950,880 L1000,930 L950,980 L900,930 Z' fill='#FF6B00' transform='rotate(60, 950, 930)'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Mesmerizing Fire Bloom Watch Face
• Premium Space Gray Aluminum Case
• Brilliant Retina OLED Display

product_details.name: Apple Watch Series - Fire Bloom Edition | Premium Smart Watch with Stunning Display
product_details.description:
• Mesmerizing Fire Bloom watch face with dynamic golden-orange animation
• Premium Space Gray aluminum case with sleek black sport band
• Brilliant Retina OLED display with crystal clear visibility
• Always-On display technology for constant time viewing
• Customizable watch faces with artistic designs
• Water-resistant design for everyday use
• Seamless integration with iPhone and Apple ecosystem
• Health and fitness tracking capabilities
• Digital crown for precise navigation
• Long-lasting battery life for all-day use
• Available in multiple size options (40mm/44mm)
• Durable scratch-resistant display glass

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek and visually striking design centered around a modern smartwatch theme. The layout is divided vertically, with text content on the left and a high-resolution product image on the right. The background uses a subtle dark gradient with glowing radial elements and stylized orange shapes, creating depth and focus areas. 

The header (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) uses bold, large fonts for a bold product edition name. A tech-style subheading (`subheading`) follows, enhancing the premium feel. A strong urgency message (`tagline`) in a vibrant orange sparks action, supported by a concise three-point feature list (`description`). The price (`price`) is prominently displayed, followed by a bright orange CTA button (`cta_button`) with white text (`cta`) for clarity and high contrast. 

The right side is dominated by the smartwatch image (`product_image`), highlighting the design and screen detail. Overall, the design is clean, professional, and clearly communicates luxury and urgency.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #1A1A1A
- Charcoal Gray: #333333
- Orange Glow: #FF6B00
- Pure White: #FFFFFF
- Medium Gray: #444444
product_color: The product image features a modern smartwatch with a sleek black band and a vivid display that captures attention through an abstract fiery design. The primary color palette includes deep black (#000000) for elegance and sophistication, complemented by metallic gray (#3C3C3C) of the watch body. The watch face showcases gold and bronze tones (#DAA520, #8B4513) swirling over a dark background, creating a sense of motion and energy. Subtle white (#FFFFFF) and bright yellow (#FFD700) accents on the hands of the clock add functionality and contrast. These colors are smoothly blended yet sharply lit to emphasize digital clarity and luxury.
